description: Lists table buckets for your account. For more information, see S3 Table buckets in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:ListTableBuckets permission to use this operation.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the table bucket.

nested_items.name: ownerAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that owns the table bucket.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the table bucket was created at.

nested_items.name: tableBucketId
nested_items.description: The system-assigned unique identifier for the table bucket.

nested_items.name: continuationToken
nested_items.description: You can use this ContinuationToken for pagination of the list results.
